channel.title: Players Online Prob!
channel.description:
Okay, so on my Rsps Server, there is a problem where in the top of quest tab and even when doing the command ::players, it shows double the amount of players. -For example, there are 3 players online, it would double it making it say there are 6 players online, in both quest tab and ::players.
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93994422/Screenshot%202015-08-06%2000.35.02.png[/img]
If anyone would be able to help that would be great! Thank you guys! Add me on skype: Melilshaw3, or just reply on this post! C:

item.title: Players Online Prob!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Retaliate, post:6, topic:552822”][quote author=matzie link=topic=671736.msg4492714#msg4492714 date=1439174063]

Showing your players command or quest tab would help.

i got ya

Guessing playerassistant.java, Look for “Players Online” I am guessing they have it like “+c.playersOnline+” * 2. Just get rid of the multiplication and it should work like a gem. If not playerassistant.java then just search for “players online” in your search bar and you will eventually find something similar to what I posted. Add me on Skype if you cannot find it and I can team viewer it and look for it with you.

“Retaliation.server” Alienware is my profile picture

It is more likely that a loop over the array occurred twice without the “playersOnline” being reset between them. Something happening to cause the counting to occur twice would be my guess. O_o
[/quote]

I was talking to him on skype it was the *2, usually your idea would be right but I had that source before and they added it in so it looked like they had lots of players lol.[/quote]
Wow lol. Makes you feel real dumb when it shows “two online” XD

Read full topic

item.title: Players Online Prob!
item.dc:creator: @Retaliate Retaliate
item.description:
@Retaliate wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:5, topic:552822”][quote author=Retaliate link=topic=671736.msg4492209#msg4492209 date=1438847576]

Showing your players command or quest tab would help.

i got ya

Guessing playerassistant.java, Look for “Players Online” I am guessing they have it like “+c.playersOnline+” * 2. Just get rid of the multiplication and it should work like a gem. If not playerassistant.java then just search for “players online” in your search bar and you will eventually find something similar to what I posted. Add me on Skype if you cannot find it and I can team viewer it and look for it with you.

“Retaliation.server” Alienware is my profile picture
[/quote]

It is more likely that a loop over the array occurred twice without the “playersOnline” being reset between them. Something happening to cause the counting to occur twice would be my guess. O_o[/quote]

I was talking to him on skype it was the *2, usually your idea would be right but I had that source before and they added it in so it looked like they had lots of players lol.

Read full topic

Okay, so on my Rsps Server, there is a problem where in the top of quest tab and even when doing the command ::players, it shows double the amount of players.
-For example, there are 3 players online, it would double it making it say there are 6 players online, in both quest tab and ::players.
